column4: can't tell, some running process get busy now and then is all we can make, what that might be... dunno what's running, so
it happens a lot while using firefox, although that's not the only case and sometimes I can go days without a freeze but other times it'll only be powered on for minutes

could be any daemon service, can't really tell, check your startup/boot apps :), I mean, I get my system busy but exactly when it  happens,I have a cpu monitor on the tray, so I can tell, and I check in 'top' and is just updatedb, which does routine files indexing for services like locate or man or others
hmm alright, looks like I'll have to do some more investigating then.  thanks
